languages.text: Записанное сообщение повторяется в вокс-диапазоне каждую одну шестнадцатую оборота планеты вокруг своей оси. Источник сигнала — корабль-ковчег "Странник в пустоши", совершивший посадку на поверхность планеты.

The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox-frequency range every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Wasteland Wayfarer, which landed on the planet's surface.
languages.original_text: Записанное сообщение повторяется в вокс-диапазоне каждую одну шестнадцатую оборота планеты вокруг своей оси. Источник сигнала — корабль-ковчег "Странник в пустоши", совершивший посадку на поверхность планеты.

traits.locale_text: The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox spectrum every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Void Wanderer, which has made landfall on the planet.

The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox spectrum every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Void Wanderer, which has made landfall on the planet.

The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox frequency range every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Void Wanderer, which landed on the planet's surface.

The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox frequency range every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Void Wanderer, which landed on the planet's surface.

The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox-frequency range every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Wasteland Wayfarer, which landed on the planet's surface.

languages.text: El mensaje pregrabado se emite en las frecuencias de vocos cada dieciseisavo de rotación axial del planeta. El origen de la transmisión es una nave arca, llamada Caminante de los Páramos, que ha aterrizado en la superficie del mundo.
languages.original_text: The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox-frequency range every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Wasteland Wayfarer, which landed on the planet's surface.

traits.locale_text: El mensaje pregrabado se emite en las frecuencias de vocos cada dieciseisavo de rotación axial del planeta. El origen de la transmisión es una nave arca, llamada Vagabundo del Vacío, que ha aterrizado en la superficie del mundo.

languages.text: 这是条预先录制好的信息。每当这颗行星轴旋转了十六分之一时，它就会在它的音阵频率范围内自动播放。信息的源头为方舟舰“荒野旅人号”，方舟舰早已降落在了行星表面。
languages.original_text: The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox-frequency range every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Wasteland Wayfarer, which landed on the planet's surface.

traits.locale_text: 这是条预先录制好的信息。每当这颗行星轴旋转了十六分之一时，它就会在它的音阵频率范围内自动播放。信息的源头为方舟舰“虚空行者”号，方舟舰早已降落在了行星表面。

languages.text: 事前録音されたそのメッセージは、惑星が16分の1回転するたびにヴォクス周波数で繰り返し再生される。発信元は、惑星に着陸したウェイストランド・ウェイフェアラー号という大型宇宙船だ。
languages.original_text: The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox-frequency range every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Wasteland Wayfarer, which landed on the planet's surface.

traits.locale_text: 事前録音されたそのメッセージは、惑星が16分の1回転するたびにヴォクス周波数で繰り返し再生される。発信元は、惑星に着陸したウェイストランド・ウェイフェアラー号という大型宇宙船だ。

languages.text: Die aufgezeichnete Nachricht wird nach jedem Sechzehntel der Axialrotation des Planeten im Vox-Frequenzbereich abgespielt. Ursprung der Übertragung ist ein Archenschiff, die Wasteland Wayfarer, die auf der Oberfläche des Planeten gelandet ist.
languages.original_text: The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox-frequency range every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Wasteland Wayfarer, which landed on the planet's surface.

traits.locale_text: Die aufgezeichnete Nachricht wird nach jedem Sechzehntel der Axialrotation des Planeten im Vox-Frequenzbereich abgespielt. Ursprung der Übertragung ist ein Archenschiff, die Void Wanderer, die auf der Oberfläche des Planeten gelandet ist.

languages.text: Le message préenregistré est émis sur la gamme de fréquences des vox tous les un-seizièmes de la rotation axiale de la planète. La source de la transmission est un vaisseau-arche, le Défricheur, qui s'est posé à la surface.
languages.original_text: The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox-frequency range every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Wasteland Wayfarer, which landed on the planet's surface.

traits.locale_text: Le message pré-enregistré est émis sur la gamme de fréquences des vox tous les un-seizièmes de la rotation axiale de la planète. La source de la transmission est un vaisseau-arche, le Voyageur du Néant, qui s'est posé à la surface.

languages.text: Bu önceden kaydedilmiş mesaj, gezegenin eksensel dönüşünün her on altıda birinin voks frekansı aralığında tekrar ediliyor. Mesajın kaynağı, gezegen yüzeyine iniş yapmış Çorak Diyar Yolcusu adındaki bir ark gemisi.
languages.original_text: The pre-recorded message is replayed in the vox-frequency range every one-sixteenth of the planet's axial rotation. The source of the transmission is an ark ship, the Wasteland Wayfarer, which landed on the planet's surface.

traits.locale_text: Bu önceden kaydedilmiş mesaj, gezegenin eksensel dönüşünün her on altıda birinin voks frekansı aralığında tekrar ediliyor. Mesajın kaynağı, gezegen yüzeyine iniş yapmış Çorak Diyar Yolcusu adındaki bir ark gemisi.
